title: Lidl-Trek Finalizes Roster for Devo Team in Hunt for Next Pogačar, Evenepoel
content:
U.S.-based squad continues overhaul after arrival of new sponsor Lidl: 'We need to have the resources the team will need in the future.'

Read the full article at Lidl-Trek Finalizes Roster for Devo Team in Hunt for Next Pogačar, Evenepoel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
